definition[0]: the ability of a company, country, or a product to compete with others
example[0]: New machinery has enhanced the company’s productivity and competitiveness.
definition[1]: the desire to be more successful than other people
example[2]: Her enthusiasm and competitiveness rubbed off on everyone.
definition[2]: the ability of a product, company, or country to compete with others
example[3]: The currency’s higher value will hurt competitiveness by making Taiwan’s exports more expensive for foreign buyers.
